Hi Brian,

> Hmm...there are already posts a short while ago about him. Seems
> generally ok.
> Watch the postage though if your country is not listed..
> $21 postage on a small tsuba??
> And seems like they won't combine shipping to save you money on 
other
> items won...some funny excuse about company policy or something.

I've actually got a combined shipping from them for 2 tsuba. It was 2-
3 months ago, so I don't know, maybe they aren't doing it anymore.

Again, personally, I've got no major complaints about this seller: 
shipping was fast, well packaged in respect to tsuba, etc. I wouldn't 
hesitate to buy from him again once I see something I'd be interested 
in.

Regards,
  Stan
